# gux-time-beta

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                         | Type                                      | Default                    |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| `time`   | `time`    | The ISO string representation of the time to format | `string`                                  | `new Date().toISOString()` |
| `format` | `format`  | Format option type                                  | `"full" \| "long" \| "medium" \| "short"` | `'full'`                   |
